title: SigSci - excessive blocked http requests
description: Notify your team when Signal Sciences Web Application Firewall has been blocking an unusually high number of web requests.

definition.message: Signal Sciences Web Application Firewall has been blocking an unusually high number of web requests. This may be indicative of a volumetric attack against one or more of your web properties or API endpoints. Details are available in your Signal Sciences console at https://dashboard.signalsciences.net/.
definition.name: SigSci - excessive blocked http requests
